entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MuggingDescription
entry.value: Damages health and morale of an allied unit for influence (granted on the next turn). Executed if done within 2 tiles of a Commissar.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MuggingFlavor
entry.value: The Jopall Indentured Squadrons will take any opportunity to repay their debts, even if it means stealing from their comrades. Of course, it's best to do so away from the watchful eyes of any Commissars...
